Nested Class Summary
static interface Toolbar.OnClickListener
          Interface used to allow the creator of a toolbar to run some code when a button on the toolbar is clicked.

setButton

public void setButton(int which,
                      java.lang.CharSequence text,
                      Toolbar.OnClickListener listener)
Set the text and listener to be invoked when corresponding button of the toolbar is pressed.

Parameters:
which - Which button to set the text and listener on, can be one of BUTTON_LEFT, BUTTON_RIGHT, or BUTTON_FULL
text - The text to display in the button.
listener - The Toolbar.OnClickListener to use.

getLeftButton

public Button getLeftButton()
Returns:
The left button of Toolbar.

public Button getRightButton()
Returns:
The right button of Toolbar.

getFullButton

public Button getFullButton()
Returns:
The only one button that exists in Toolbar.

getButton

public Button getButton(int which)
Parameters:
which - Which button to return. Can be one of BUTTON_LEFT, BUTTON_RIGHT, or BUTTON_FULL
Returns:
The corresponding button of Toolbar.
